SandblastDebuff.name: Sandblasted
SandblastDebuff.description: There is sand in your eyes.
Spawning.name: Spawning
SpawnOnAnyFarm.name: Spawn on Any Farm
SpawnOnAnyFarm.description:
Whether to spawn cropbeasts on farms that don't otherwise have monsters,
disregarding the Wilderness Farm type and the Dark Statue of Night Terrors.
AllowSimultaneous.name: Allow Simultaneous Cropbeasts
AllowSimultaneous.description: Whether additional cropbeasts can spawn while another cropbeast is still active.
OutdoorSpawnLimit.name: Outdoor Spawn Limit
OutdoorSpawnLimit.description:
How many times per day cropbeasts can spawn outdoors on the farm.
Set to -1 for unlimited spawns. Set to 0 to disable outdoor cropbeasts.
IndoorSpawnLimit.name: Indoor Spawn Limit
IndoorSpawnLimit.description:
How many times per day cropbeasts can spawn indoors in the greenhouse.
Set to -1 for unlimited spawns. Set to 0 to disable indoor cropbeasts.
WickedStatueRange.name: Wicked Statue Range
WickedStatueRange.description:
The radius (in tiles) around a Wicked Statue where crops are protected from becoming cropbeasts.
Set to -1 for infinite range. Set to 0 to disable the statues. (Scarecrows have a range of 9 tiles.)
WitchFlyovers.name: Witch Flyovers
WitchFlyovers.description:
Whether the witch should fly over the first outdoor cropbeast crop
of each day and cast a spell to start the process.
Visibility.name: Visibility
HighContrast.name: High Contrast
HighContrast.description:
Whether cropbeasts that look very similar to crops should be tinted
more vividly to increase their contrast with the crops around them.
TrackingArrows.name: Tracking Arrows
TrackingArrows.description:
Whether to display arrows pointing to offscreen cropbeasts,
like those provided by the Tracker profession.
ExcludedBeasts.name: Specific Cropbeasts
ExcludedBeasts.description: Uncheck a box to exclude that type of cropbeast from spawning.
BerrybeastFace.name: Berrybeast Face
BerrybeastFace.description: What kind of face should appear on Berrybeasts.
CactusbeastSandblast.name: Cactusbeast Sandblasts
CactusbeastSandblast.description: Whether sandblasts from Cactusbeasts cover the screen with sand.
RootbeastHiding.name: Rootbeasts Hide in Dirt
RootbeastHiding.description: Whether Rootbeasts hide in the dirt, appearing like a crop, when far from any farmer.
